Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

You're invited to the Oakland Museum of California on Sunday, August 25. Join us and enjoy food, drinks (cash bar), and youth-friendly activities.

Hear from staff working across California:

  • At the border, in the Central Valley, and in the legislature.
  • In partnership with the Yurok Tribe.
  • Uncovering the hidden history of slavery in California.

Making California's History

A family-friendly event in the garden.

Sunday, August 25, 5 - 8 p.m.
Oakland Museum of California
1000 Oak St.
Oakland, CA 94607

Accessibility and parking:

  • The Oakland Museum of California is accessible to wheelchair users.
  • OMCA's parking garage is located on Oak Street between 10th & 12th St.
